original_text: The first servant came to him and said, “Master, your money has made ten more pounds for you.”
korean_text: 그 첫째가 나아와 이르되 주인이여 당신의 한 므나로 열 므나를 남겼나이다

sentences.original_text: The first servant came to him
your money has made ten more pounds for you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 돈이 당신을 위해 열 파운드를 더 벌어들였습니다
